---
params:
  author: "Mickaël Canouil"
  xlsx: "data/cv.xlsx"
  bib: "data/cv.bib"
  picture: "data/cv.png"
title: '`r paste(params[["author"]], "Curriculum Vitæ", sep = " - ")`'
author: '`r params[["author"]]`'
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ["utils/curriculum_vitae.css", "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.11.2/css/all.min.css"]
    mathjax: null
    includes:
      in_header: "utils/_ga_script.html"
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
knit: (function(inputFile, encoding) {
    rmarkdown::render(
      inputFile,
      encoding = encoding, 
      output_dir = "docs"
    )
  })
---

```{r}
cat(
```

```{r, out.extra = 'style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 90%;"'}
dir.create(file.path(tempdir(), "hex"), showWarnings = FALSE)
source(file.path("utils", "hexwall.R"))
hex_list <- c(
  "rlille.png", 
  "omicsr.png", 
  "coeos.png",
  "carot.png", 
  "insane.png", 
  "mistr.png", 
  "nacho.png", 
  "rain.png"
)
hex_logo <- glue::glue("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mcanouil/hex-stickers/master/PNG/{tolower(hex_list)}")
hex_logo_ordered <- file.path(tempdir(), "hex", paste(1:length(hex_logo), basename(hex_logo), sep = "-"))
utils::download.file(url = hex_logo, destfile = hex_logo_ordered, method = "libcurl")
hex_wall <- hexwall(
  path = file.path(tempdir(), "hex"),
  sticker_row_size = 8,
  sticker_width = 181
)
# magick::image_write(image = hex_wall, path = file.path("data", "hex_wall.png"), format = "png")
unlink(file.path(tempdir(), "hex"), recursive = TRUE)
hex_wall
```
